title: How to Pass Tropical Wilds in Pikmin 3

steps.headline: Look around next to the landing site.
steps.description: There is a tree with a hole. Go there.

steps.headline: Keep walking inside the tree and kill the fire creatures.
steps.description: Then you will see light, and you can get out of the tree.

steps.headline: Keep walking straight.
steps.description: Watch out for the bugs. Then you will encounter the spot where you found the red onion.

steps.headline: Turn right and keep going right.
steps.description: Once you see a ledge, throw your crew-mates and all of your Pikmin. Then keep walking and throw your last crew-mate and all of your Pikmin on the next ledge, until you're down to one member.

steps.headline: Keep walking.
steps.description: Make sure to get all of the stuff you see along the way.

steps.headline: Look out for the fly.
steps.description: Kill it and build the bridge. The pieces are nearby and behind a sand wall.

steps.headline: Call your crew-mates after you've built the bridge.
steps.description: This can be easy if you have the "Go here" function.

steps.headline: Find a stump near the bridge pieces.
steps.description: Throw your crew-mates and Pikmin there. Then throw your last member and Pikmin to the other side of the falls.

steps.headline: Keep walking.
steps.description: Walk on the other passage you encounter, and defeat the boss.

steps.headline: After the boss, go back to the sandbag.
steps.description: Push it to let your Pikmin go through.

text: Look around next to the landing site. There is a tree with a hole. Go there. Keep walking inside the tree and kill the fire creatures. Then you will see light, and you can get out of the tree. Keep walking straight. Watch out for the bugs. Then you will encounter the spot where you found the red onion. Turn right and keep going right. Once you see a ledge, throw your crew-mates and all of your Pikmin. Then keep walking and throw your last crew-mate and all of your Pikmin on the next ledge, until you're down to one member. Keep walking. Make sure to get all of the stuff you see along the way. Look out for the fly. Kill it and build the bridge. The pieces are nearby and behind a sand wall. Call your crew-mates after you've built the bridge. This can be easy if you have the "Go here" function. Find a stump near the bridge pieces. Throw your crew-mates and Pikmin there. Then throw your last member and Pikmin to the other side of the falls. Keep walking. Walk on the other passage you encounter, and defeat the boss. After the boss, go back to the sandbag. Push it to let your Pikmin go through.
